name: faux cables socks
notes:
these socks feature slipped stitches and twisted stitches creating a design that looks like cables. they are mirrored with the cables leaning to the right or to the left.

they are worked from the top down with a heel flap and gusset. only one color is used per round and colors are alternated each round, making the color work easy.

yarns:
main color,mc: 200-260 m (220-285 yards) in solid.
contrasting color, cc: 110-160 m (120-175 yards) in solid, semi-solid, self-striping or gradient.

sizes: small: european 38-39. medium: european 40-42. large: european 43-45.

notions: tapestry needle, 3 stitch markers
